text: We don't make music - it makes us.
author: David Byrne

text: People are already finding ways to make their music and play it in front of people and have a life in music, I guess, and I think that's pretty much all you can ask.
author: David Byrne

text: Even from a listening end now, I'm still completely a fan of music.
author: James Iha

text: I'm not suggesting people abandon musical instruments and start playing their cars and apartments, but I do think the reign of music as a commodity made only by professionals might be winding down.
author: David Byrne

text: We tend to mistake music for the physical object.
author: David Byrne
